    1. render(Graphics2D)

接口 Drawable

所有已知子接口:
Animatable
所有已知实现类:
AnimatablePanel, BoundedString, Chart, ChartText, CollectionSelection, CollectionSelectionText, CRect, CRectButton, CShape, CTriangle, CTriangleButton, DynamicCRectButton, DynamicImage, DynamicMotionManager, DynamicObject, DynamicString, KButton, ResetUserButton, ResultPage, SelectionButtons, Settings, SettingsCRectButtons, SettingsSlidingButton, SettingsText, SlidingButton, SongSelection, UserSelection, UserSelectionButton, UserSelectionText, WelcomePage
public interface Drawable
This interface has a method that defines how to draw the object that implement this. Note that this is not the same as paintComponent(Graphics g) in JPanel. This passes in a Graphics2D object for more customized rendering.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    void
    render(Graphics2D g2d)
    Render the object that implements it.
